answer: I've heard of people camping on the beach at Enoshima but I don't think it's an official campground. Enoshima is about 1 30 from Tokyo and the station is a block or two from the beach.
subtitle: I am looking for a place to camp a tent coming by bicycle or train at walking distance from a beach and not far from Tokyo a . Any recommendation? I have found a few lists of camping addresses but no reasonably exhaustive map. There are lists in PDF format but it is really hard to estimate location from that. The ideal would be a Google Maps based mashup showing all campings if that exists?
title: Camping near a beach not far from Tokyo
